name: Craftwork
headline: Digital-native home painting franchise
description: Craftwork is a full-service home painting company that uses software to dramatically improve the homeowner and operator experience.

founders.name: Tim Griffin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Tim is an active angel investor and two-time YC founder. He's currently the co-founder and CEO of Craftwork (YC S23) and previously founded Cloosiv (YC S19), a company that he successfully completed a merger of equals with Odeko and grew annual revenue from $0 to $150M+ in just 18 months. Odeko is currently #115 on Y Combinator‚Äôs top companies list.

founders.name: Mike Bifulco, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO of Craftwork, co-founder of APIs You Won't Hate, author at mikebifulco.com. Co-founder of smpl (acquired 2020). 

Past work includes DevRel at Stripe, DevRel manager and TL for Google Assistant, UX at Microsoft, and Technical Director at Gymnasium 

üíå Tiny Improvements: https://mikebifulco.com/newsletter

founders.name: Suzanne Griffin, Founder
founders.description: I've been an early stage employee at two YC startups (CareRev S16, and Plato W16) and I'm the Co-founder of Craftwork (YC S23).

founders.name: Joey Skavroneck, Founder
founders.description: Joey scaled Zoomo from a seed stage company to the global leader in their category, leading their North American business and largest global partnerships. Previously, he was a management consultant, sold his OOH advertising company, and earned his MBA from Stanford GSB.

## Interior Painting
Trust in our expertise to revitalize your home's interiors, as we combine years of experience with top-of-the-line materials to deliver unmatched quality and customer satisfaction with every brushstroke.
[Interiors ‚Üí](https://craftwork.com/</interior>)
![Craftowrk interior painting](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fservices%2Finteriors%2Finteriors.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Exterior Painting
Whether you're looking to refresh your siding, revitalize your trim, or give your front door a vibrant makeover, our exterior painting can breathe new life into your home's exterior.
[Exteriors ‚Üí](https://craftwork.com/</exterior>)
![Craftwork exterior painting](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fservices%2Fexteriors%2Fexteriors.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Cabinet Finishing
Unleash the full potential of your kitchen or cabinetry with our expert cabinet finishing services. Whether you desire a modern update or a timeless classic look, our skilled craftsmen will transform your cabinets into stunning focal points that truly define your space.
[Cabinets ‚Üí](https://craftwork.com/</cabinetry>)
![Craftwork cabinet finishing](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fservices%2Fcabinets%2Fcabinets.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## We make it easy for you to complete your next paint project
1
### Estimate
Answer a few questions about your project and get an estimate for the cost and timeline in as little as 30 seconds.
2
### Plan
Finalize your project by uploading a few pictures with more detail, and then schedule with our crew in minutes.
3
### Execute
Relax while our skilled team delivers the highest quality paint job in your home, giving you complete peace of mind.
[How it works](https://craftwork.com/</how-it-works>)[About Us](https://craftwork.com/</company>)
### No hidden fees,No surprises
We believe that all homeowners deserve access to high quality craftsmanship, regardless of who they are or where they live.
With Craftwork, there's no more guessing about how much your next paint project will cost - our online estimate tool and flat-rate pricing ensures you'll always know exactly what to expect.
Free Estimate
Don't just take our word for it.
![‚ÄúWe used Craftwork to repair and paint the accent wall in our kitchen, and we're very happy with it.‚Äù](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fproject-gallery%2Finteriors%2Finteriors-8.webp&w=3840&q=100)
‚ÄúWe used Craftwork to repair and paint the accent wall in our kitchen, and we're very happy with it.‚Äù
We used Craftwork to repair and paint the accent wall in our kitchen, and we're very happy with it. The wall had damage from the previous owner, and the Craftwork team did an incredible job fixing it and apply a fresh coat of paint on top!
![avatar](https://craftwork.com/images/testimonials/ron-l/avatar.svg)
Shelly
![Craftwork did an amazing job making my vision come to life. My home was transformed!](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fcatherine-c%2Fpic.webp&w=3840&q=100)
Craftwork did an amazing job making my vision come to life. My home was transformed!
We worked with Craftwork to paint multiple areas of our home. Their staff is professional, timely and pays attention to every detail. They do amazing work and I know we will continue to work with Craftwork in the future!
![avatar](https://craftwork.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ftestimonials%2Fcatherine-c%2Favatar.webp&w=96&q=100)
Catherine
## Meet our talented [Charlotte, NC](https://craftwork.com/</locations/charlotte>) team
It can be uncomfortable inviting strangers into your home, so let's get acquainted - here a few examples of the talented people we have on our team!
We train our painters from apprentice to seasoned veteran, to ensure that we always deliver the highest quality paint work in your home.
[About Us](https://craftwork.com/</company>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Craftwork**

Founded in 2023, Craftwork is a digital-native home painting franchise based in Charlotte, North Carolina. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, this fast-growing company focuses on transforming the home painting experience using innovative software solutions. With a dedicated team of 50 employees, Craftwork aims to simplify and enhance how homeowners approach painting projects.

**Mission and Services:**
Craftwork's mission is clear: to create a seamless, transparent experience for homeowners looking to beautify their spaces. They offer a variety of services, including:

- **Interior Painting:** Revitalize the inside of your home with expert craftsmanship.
- **Exterior Painting:** Breathe new life into your home's curb appeal.
- **Cabinet Finishing:** Transform kitchens with stylish cabinet upgrades.
- **Commercial Services:** Catering to business environments needing a fresh coat.

Their ethos revolves around simplicity, providing quick estimates, clear pricing, and a streamlined process from project conception to execution. Homeowners just answer a few questions to receive a cost estimate, upload details for planning, and then relax as Craftwork's professional team takes over.

**Core Values:**
Craftwork emphasizes transparency, with no hidden fees or unexpected costs‚Äîjust quality craftsmanship accessible to everyone.

**Community and Team:**
The company is proud to serve the Charlotte area, with a strong commitment to customer satisfaction reflected in glowing testimonials from pleased clients. The team's expertise ranges from fresh apprentices to seasoned painting veterans, ensuring top-notch results.

**Contact and Learn More:**
If you're located in or around Charlotte, and are considering a painting project, Craftwork is worth a look. You can reach them at (704) 380-9035 or explore their services through their website: [Craftwork](https://craftwork.com/).

In a nutshell, Craftwork stands out not just for its painting prowess, but for leveraging technology to improve the customer experience‚Äîmaking it easier than ever to add a splash of color to your home.
